Text: Can we have the list please, also dont zip in the future we cant choose the once we want, we have to take them all even if we have many of them. Thanks for this.
Utorrent does not allow me to put multiple files into 1 torrent, either that or i simply do not know how to do it, that is the reason for the zip.
How you do it with uTorrent is just put them all into a FOLDER and then when creating torrent tell it "FOLDER".
Ah ha! i figured it out, it is add directory.
